title: Documenting Indiaâ€™s Distinctive Birdhouses
description: For seven years, a photographer based in Delhi has collected images of ornamental structures known as chabutras. Here are some of his favorites.
dc:creator: Nipun Prabhakar
media:description: A large birdhouse in the village of Sinugra, in the western state of Gujarat. The structure not only houses birds but also has space to store their grains.
